denom.description: denom is the coin denom to query the metadata for.

QueryDenomMetadataByQueryStringRequest.title: Query Denom Metadata By Query String Request
QueryDenomMetadataByQueryStringRequest.description: QueryDenomMetadataByQueryStringRequest is the request type for the Query/DenomMetadata RPC method. Identical with QueryDenomMetadataRequest but receives denom as query string.
